verses.verse: Now this <WH2088> is the blessing <WH1293> with which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> the man <WH376> of God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> before <WH6440> his death. <WH4194>

And he said, <WH559> "The Lord <WH3068> came <WH935> from Sinai, <WH5514> And dawned <WH2224> on them from Seir; <WH8165> He shone <WH3313> forth <WH3313> from Mount <WH2022> Paran, <WH6290> And He came <WH857> from the midst of ten <WH7233> thousand <WH7233> holy <WH6944> ones; <WH6944> At His right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> there was flashing <WH799> lightning <WH799> for them.

"Indeed, <WH637> He loves <WH2245> the people; <WH5971> All <WH3605> Thy holy <WH6918> ones <WH6918> are in Thy hand, <WH3027> And they followed <WH8497> in Thy steps; <WH7272> [Everyone] receives <WH5375> of Thy words. <WH1703>
"Moses <WH4872> charged <WH6680> us with a law, <WH8451> A possession <WH4181> for the assembly <WH6952> of Jacob. <WH3290>
"And He was king <WH4428> in Jeshurun, <WH3484> When the heads <WH7218> of the people <WH5971> were gathered, <WH622> The tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> together. <WH3162>
"May Reuben <WH7205> live <WH2421> and not die, <WH4191> Nor <WH408> his men <WH4962> be few. <WH4557>"

And this <WH2088> regarding Judah; <WH3063> so he said, <WH559> "Hear, <WH8085> O Lord, <WH3068> the voice <WH6963> of Judah, <WH3063> And bring <WH935> him to his people. <WH5971> With his hands <WH3027> he contended <WH7378> for them; And mayest Thou be a help <WH5828> against <WH4480> his adversaries. <WH6862>"

And of Levi <WH3878> he said, <WH559> "[Let] Thy Thummim <WH8550> and Thy Urim <WH224> [belong] to Thy godly <WH2623> man, <WH376> Whom <WH834> Thou didst prove <WH5254> at Massah, <WH4532> With whom Thou didst contend <WH7378> at the waters <WH4325> of Meribah; <WH4809>

Who said <WH559> of his father and his mother, <WH1> 'I did not consider <WH517> them'; And he did not acknowledge <WH7200> his brothers, <WH5234> Nor <WH251> did he regard <WH3808> his own sons, <WH3045> For they observed <WH1121> Thy word, <WH8104> And kept <WH565> Thy covenant. <WH5341>

"They shall teach <WH3384> Thine ordinances <WH4941> to Jacob, <WH3290> And Thy law <WH8451> to Israel. <WH3478> They shall put <WH7760> incense <WH6988> before <WH639> Thee, And whole <WH3632> burnt <WH3632> offerings <WH3632> on Thine altar. <WH4196>

"O Lord, <WH3068> bless <WH1288> his substance, <WH2428> And accept <WH7521> the work <WH6467> of his hands; <WH3027> Shatter <WH4272> the loins <WH4975> of those who rise <WH6965> up against him, And those who hate <WH8130> him, so <WH4480> that they may not rise <WH6965> [again.]"

Of Benjamin <WH1144> he said, <WH559> "May the beloved <WH3039> of the Lord <WH3068> dwell <WH7931> in security <WH983> by Him, Who shields <WH2653> him all <WH3605> the day, <WH3117> And he dwells <WH7931> between <WH996> His shoulders. <WH3802>"

And of Joseph <WH3130> he said, <WH559> "Blessed <WH1288> of the Lord <WH3068> [be] his land, <WH776> With the choice <WH4022> things <WH4022> of heaven, <WH8064> with the dew, <WH2919> And from the deep <WH8415> lying <WH7257> beneath, <WH8478>
And with the choice <WH4022> yield <WH8393> of the sun, <WH8121> And with the choice <WH4022> produce <WH1645> of the months. <WH3391>
"And with the best <WH7218> things <WH7218> of the ancient <WH6924> mountains, <WH2022> And with the choice <WH4022> things <WH4022> of the everlasting <WH5769> hills, <WH1389>

And with the choice <WH4022> things <WH4022> of the earth <WH776> and its fulness, <WH4393> And the favor <WH7522> of Him who dwelt <WH7931> in the bush. <WH5572> Let it come <WH935> to the head <WH7218> of Joseph, <WH3130> And to the crown <WH6936> of the head <WH6936> of the one <WH5139> distinguished <WH5139> among his brothers. <WH251>

"As the first-born of his ox, <WH7794> majesty <WH1926> is his, And his horns <WH7161> are the horns <WH7161> of the wild <WH7214> ox; <WH7214> With them he shall push <WH5055> the peoples, <WH5971> All <WH9191> at once, <WH9191> [to] the ends <WH657> of the earth. <WH776> And those <WH1992> are the ten <WH7233> thousands <WH7233> of Ephraim, <WH669> And those <WH1992> are the thousands <WH505> of Manasseh. <WH4519>"
And of Zebulun <WH2074> he said, <WH559> "Rejoice, <WH8055> Zebulun, <WH2074> in your going <WH3318> forth, <WH3318> And, Issachar, <WH3485> in your tents. <WH168>

"They shall call <WH7121> peoples <WH5971> [to] the mountain; <WH2022> There <WH8033> they shall offer <WH2076> righteous <WH6664> sacrifices; <WH2077> For they shall draw <WH3243> out the abundance <WH8228> of the seas, <WH3220> And the hidden <WH2934> treasures <WH5603> of the sand. <WH2344>"

And of Gad <WH1410> he said, <WH559> "Blessed <WH1288> is the one who enlarges <WH7337> Gad; <WH1410> He lies <WH7931> down <WH7931> as a lion, <WH3833> And tears <WH2963> the arm, <WH2220> also <WH637> the crown <WH6936> of the head. <WH6936>

"Then he provided <WH7200> the first <WH7225> [part] for himself, For there <WH8033> the ruler's portion <WH2513> was reserved; <WH5603> And he came <WH857> [with] the leaders <WH7218> of the people; <WH5971> He executed <WH6213> the justice <WH6666> of the Lord, <WH3068> And His ordinances <WH4941> with Israel. <WH3478>"
And of Dan <WH1835> he said, <WH559> "Dan <WH1835> is a lion's whelp, <WH1482> That leaps <WH2187> forth from Bashan. <WH1316>"

And of Naphtali <WH5321> he said, <WH559> "O Naphtali, <WH5321> satisfied <WH7649> with favor, <WH7522> And full <WH4392> of the blessing <WH1293> of the Lord, <WH3068> Take <WH3423> possession <WH3423> of the sea <WH3220> and the south. <WH1864>"

And of Asher <WH836> he said, <WH559> "More <WH4480> blessed <WH1288> than <WH4480> sons <WH1121> is Asher; <WH836> May he be favored <WH7521> by his brothers, <WH251> And may he dip <WH2881> his foot <WH7272> in oil. <WH8081>
"Your locks <WH4515> shall be iron <WH1270> and bronze, <WH5178> And according to your days, <WH3117> so shall your leisurely <WH1679> walk <WH1679> be.
"There <WH369> is none <WH369> like the God <WH410> of Jeshurun, <WH3484> Who rides <WH7392> the heavens <WH8064> to your help, <WH5828> And through the skies <WH7834> in His majesty. <WH1346>

"The eternal <WH6924> God <WH430> is a dwelling <WH4585> place, <WH4585> And underneath <WH8478> are the everlasting <WH5769> arms; <WH2220> And He drove <WH1644> out the enemy <WH340> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> you, And said, <WH559> 'Destroy! <WH8045>'

"So Israel <WH3478> dwells <WH7931> in security, <WH983> The fountain <WH9407> of Jacob <WH3290> secluded, <WH910> In a land <WH776> of grain <WH1715> and new <WH8492> wine; <WH8492> His heavens <WH8064> also <WH637> drop <WH6201> down <WH6201> dew. <WH2919>

"Blessed <WH835> are you, O Israel; <WH3478> Who <WH4310> is like <WH3644> you, a people <WH5971> saved <WH3467> by the Lord, <WH3068> Who is the shield <WH4043> of your help, <WH5828> And the sword <WH2719> of your majesty! <WH1346> So your enemies <WH340> shall cringe <WH3584> before you, And you shall tread <WH1869> upon their high <WH1116> places. <WH1116>"
